feature.label: opt4j external dependency
feature.provider-name: Software Engineering Group, Heinz Nixdorf Institute, Paderborn University, Germany (NOT the author)
feature.description: This feature provides a plugin that the ships the * opt4j-3.1.3.jar * opt4j-benchmarks-3.1.3.jar * opt4j-core-3.1.3.jar * opt4j-operators-3.1.3.jar * opt4j-optimizers-3.1.3.jar * opt4j-satdecoding-3.1.3.jar * opt4j-tutorial-3.1.3.jar * opt4j-viewer-3.1.3.jar which are provided by the opt4j-3.1.3.zip archive (http://opt4j.sourceforge.net/download.html). For more information about opt4j, see http://opt4j.sourceforge.net
